metadata.title: USN-4816-1 -- game-music-emu vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that game-music-emu mishandled certain crafted input. A remote attacker could use this vulnerability to cause game-music-emu to crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4816-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libgme0 - 0.5.5-2ubuntu0.14.04.1+esm1 libgme-dev - 0.5.5-2ubuntu0.14.04.1+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
